I got banned because this polish kid was hacking and in a childish, pathetic fit of rage I downloaded and injected hacks. That type of behavior is against my morals! This game has the ability to bring a grown man to the verge of tears and cheat just to try and prove something to a random child. I have yet to find a game which can bring out such emotion from me, absolute 10/10
